data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Colpani, Daniara, Benetti, Cesar João, Hamada, Neusa (2014): A Checklist of the Gyrinidae (Coleoptera: Adephaga) of Brazil. Zootaxa 3889 (2): 185-213, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3889.2.2
